name: Love Stories: Episode Choice
description:
Make your own romance episodes now ! Love Stories is a highly interactive story game featuring the surprising and exciting stories. Experience your story, your way, where you control what happens next!

Choose your story, choose your path, choose your life. What you can expect with Love Stories:

• Exclusive collection of chapters interactive stories
• Choose your own story from our constantly growing library
• Character customization：Customize your main character, including your skin, hairstyle, and outfit!
• Romanticize your favorite characters
• Fall in love, solve mysteries and embark on epic fantasy adventures
• Control what happens next in immersive visual stories!

You’ll love making choices in this interactive story game! The chapters game that let you choose your own path in every story. You will be part of romantic stories and you’ll be able to make choices to create your own story. Every choice you made will lead to different endings. No one knows the ending. The story is created by YOU, and only belongs to YOU！

Our most popular interactive stories include:

Fatal Love Vampire - A wounded Vampire bursts into your room at a rainy night. You cure him but later you find werewolves and witches are gathering and tring to kill you…Why?
The Killer - This time my target is to kill a young handsome man. He treats me so well and I just couldn’t bring myself to do it. I hope I won’t lose control...or will he be my exception?
Runaway Bride - On the eve of the wedding, the bride suddenly disappeared. In order to find the missing bride, the groom finally found the female high school classmate. But unexpectedly, she has bad intentions...
Oblivion - You and Abby were attracted to each other by chance encounter. However, a major company accident happened suddenly. They have suspicions and doubts about each other, what will their relationship be like....
Call Me By Your Name - After seven years of separation, Steve and Billy stood shoulder to shoulder again and went through hardships, which eventually waited for the promulgation of the same-sex marriage act.
Princess - The princess Sofia encountered an unexpected accident in the forest and was rescued by the kind and handsome villager Jack. But she did not expect that Jack's true identity was...

Personally define and experience chapters and chapters of interactive stories - from romance to suspense, mystery to thriller. Enjoy the exciting process of loving and killing each other in these romance games.

Download LOVE STORIES now, your crucial choices will let you discover the stories that you UNEXPECTED.So,be romance and find a true love.Choose, enjoy and live your love story in journeys, the interactive series collection where YOU control the outcome!
